code: import React from'react';import'./ZoneSelector.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ZoneSelector=_ref=>{let{onSelectZone}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{id:"zone-selector",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"page-title",children:"Department Locator"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"page-subtitle",children:"Choose your zone inside the plant to view departments and open navigation."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"zone-buttons",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"zone-btn",onClick:()=>onSelectZone('east'),children:"East Land Departments"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"zone-btn",onClick:()=>onSelectZone('main'),children:"Main Land Departments"})]})]});};export default ZoneSelector;
